module.name: HTML
module.param:
About Splunk on Splunk

Splunk on Splunk version 3.2 - build 207364

The original 'Splunk on Splunk' project was spearheaded by Jon Woodard, starting in 2008. Now with our vastly improved and flexible UI, we take the knowledge built up through the years on this project and enable Customers to see what Splunk Support sees when looking at diag data. Thank you Jon for all your contributions to Splunk Support!

For information about general usage of this app, consult the README file at $$SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/sos/README.

module.name: HTML
module.param:
